item.title: Diagrams In Blog
item.description: I use a text to diagram tool called PlantUML. It's perfect! Now, I want to use it with my hugo site, through a short code. So, I I type a code like below, I should see out like as the image. 1@startuml 2A -> B : Hello 3A <- B : Hi There! 4@enduml Update: I spend many hours trying to work this out. Created a firebase function to process posting and converting and yada yada.
